timeline.bodyText:
did you want to add an else condition to capture any regressions or new conditions that don't satisfy the above if checks?
You can add a warning log to highlight it.
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: There's no harm at all if it's just a pass through (called with transaction types not supported), so I'd rather not add any logging.
replies.author: mike-burrage-hedera

replies.bodyText: Integration test cases ensure that those 4 types do in fact end up in this code when calling RecordFileLogger.
replies.author: mike-burrage-hedera

timeline.message:
Change setting persistNonFeeTransfersAlways to persisNonFeeTransfers. Either always store them or do not, based on the setting.

Signed-off-by: Mike Burrage <mike.burrage@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we add an auto-generated primary key anyway like we need to add to do on t_cryptotransferlists to make it faster to replicate?
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
It's not clear if we're running into replication delay due to missing autoincrement/primary key on t_cryptotransferlists. (#525 (comment))
I can add to this table if you want. It'll impact insert performance some amount, but it's unclear which performance tradeoff is more critical.
replies.author: mike-burrage-hedera

replies.bodyText: Let's just do when #525 is implemented
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Can these be consolidated into one now?
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
They're both used but I can make the update.
They also should both probably return lists instead of optional singles.
Change is minor and there are only a few tests using these.
replies.author: mike-burrage-hedera
